text: [Jusuf] Guft: «Heç ƣizoe ʙaroi xūrdan nazdaton nameovarand, magar on ki peş az ovardanaş, şumoro az [kajfijatu] haqiqataş ogoh sozam. In [axʙori ƣajʙī] az onhost, ki Parvardigoram ʙa man omūxtaast. Dar haqiqat, man oini qavmero, ki ʙa Alloh taolo imon nameovarand va ʙa [saroi] oxirat [niz] kufr mevarzand, tark kardam
